instructions: Answer the following questions to the best of your ability. This test will help determine your current skill level for DevOps.

questions.question: What is version control, and why is Git commonly used in DevOps workflows?
Explain the concept of Continuous Integration (CI) and its benefits.
What is the difference between a container and a virtual machine?
In Docker, what is the purpose of a Dockerfile?
What is Infrastructure as Code (IaC) and give an example of a tool used for it.
Describe the difference between Continuous Delivery and Continuous Deployment.
What is Kubernetes and why is it used in container orchestration?
Explain how monitoring and logging are essential for DevOps workflows.
What are some best practices for securing a CI/CD pipeline?
Describe a real-world scenario where automation improved deployment speed and reliability.
